description: Acerca al enemigo para que\nel golpe no falle.

name: BESO DULCE
description: Pide un beso con dulzura\ny suele causar confusión.

name: TAMBOR
description: Reduce tus PS para\nmejorar el ATAQUE.

name: BOMBA LODO
description: Explosión de lodo que puede\nllegar a envenenar.

name: BOFETÓN LODO
description: Echa lodo en la cara\npara bajar la PRECISIÓN.

name: PULPOCAÑÓN
description: Dispara tinta para atacar\ny bajar la PRECISIÓN.

name: PÚAS
description: Riega púas que hieren si\nel rival pide el relevo.

name: ELECTROCAÑÓN
description: No es certero, pero causa\nparálisis si atina.

name: PROFECÍA
description: Anula los intentos del rival\nde aumentar la EVASIÓN.

name: MISMODESTINO
description: Si te debilitas, el enemigo\nse debilita contigo.

name: CANTO MORTAL
description: A los 3 turnos del canto,\ncaen rival y atacante.

name: VIENTO HIELO
description: Ataque helado que\nbaja la VELOCIDAD.

name: DETECCIÓN
description: Frena ataques, pero puede\nfallar si se usa sin parar.

name: ATAQUE ÓSEO
description: Hueso en ristre, aporrea\nal enemigo de 2 a 5 veces.

name: FIJAR BLANCO
description: Fija el blanco para que el\nsiguiente ataque no falle.

name: ENFADO
description: Embestida que dura 2 ó 3\nturnos y te confunde.

name: TORM. ARENA
description: Tormenta de arena\nque dura varios turnos.

name: GIGADRENADO
description: Absorbe la mitad\ndel daño producido.

name: AGUANTE
description: Resiste el ataque de 1\nturno y deja al menos 1 PS.

name: ENCANTO
description: Engatusa al rival y reduce\nbastante su ATAQUE.

name: DESENROLLAR
description: Ataque de 5 turnos,\ncon fuerza cada vez mayor.

name: FALSOTORTAZO
description: Deja al enemigo\ncon al menos 1 PS.

name: CONTONEO
description: Provoca confusión, pero\ntambién sube el ATAQUE.

name: BATIDO
description: Restaura hasta la mitad\nde tus PS máximos.

name: CHISPA
description: Ataque eléctrico que puede\nllegar a paralizar.

name: CORTEFURIA
description: Crece en intensidad\nsi se usa repetidas veces.

name: ALA DE ACERO
description: Alas rígidas que\ngolpean al rival.

name: MAL DE OJO
description: Mal de ojo que impide al\nrival huir o pedir el relevo.

name: ATRACCIÓN
description: Reduce la posibilidad de que\nel enemigo ataque.

name: SONÁMBULO
description: Mientras duerme, usa un\nataque elegido al azar.

name: CAMPANA CURA
description: Repicar que cura los\nproblemas de estado.

name: RETROCESO
description: Ataque que aumenta sus\nefectos con la amistad.

name: PRESENTE
description: Regalo con forma de bomba.\nPuede que restaure los PS.

name: FRUSTRACIÓN
description: Es más fuerte si no se\naprecia al ENTRENADOR.

name: VELO SAGRADO
description: Fuerza mística que evita\nproblemas de estado.

name: DIVIDE DOLOR
description: Une tus PS a los del rival\ny los reparte por igual.

name: FUEGOSAGRADO
description: Fuego místico que\npuede causar quemaduras.

name: MAGNITUD
description: Sacudida sísmica\nde intensidad variable.

name: PUÑODINÁMICO
description: No es certero, pero\ncausa confusión si atina.

name: MEGACUERNO
description: Violenta embestida con\nretorcidos cuernos.

name: DRAGOALIENTO
description: Fuerte ráfaga de aliento\nque golpea al enemigo.

name: RELEVO
description: Cambia de compañero y\nmantiene los estados.

name: OTRA VEZ
description: El rival repite el último\nataque de 2 a 6 veces.

name: PERSECUCIÓN
description: Hace mucho daño al rival\nque pide el relevo.

name: GIRO RÁPIDO
description: Ataque corporal giratorio\nde gran velocidad.

name: DULCE AROMA
description: Engatusa al rival para\nreducir su EVASIÓN.

name: COLA FÉRREA
description: Ataca con una cola férrea\ny puede bajar la DEFENSA.

name: GARRA METAL
description: Ataque con garra que puede\naumentar tu ATAQUE.

name: TIRO VITAL
description: Lleva su tiempo, pero no\nfalla.

name: SOL MATINAL
description: Restaura PS. La cantidad\nvaría según el clima.

name: SÍNTESIS
description: Restaura PS. La cantidad\nvaría según el clima.

name: LUZ LUNAR
description: Restaura PS. La cantidad\nvaría según el clima.

name: PODER OCULTO
description: Su eficacia varía\nsegún el agresor.

name: TAJO CRUZADO
description: Corte doble que suele\npropinar un golpe crítico.

name: CICLÓN
description: Crea un violento tornado\npara hacer trizas al rival.

name: DANZA LLUVIA
description: Refuerza los ataques de\ntipo AGUA durante 5 turnos.

name: DÍA SOLEADO
description: Sube los ataques de tipo\nFUEGO durante 5 turnos.

name: TRITURAR
description: Tritura con finos colmillos\ny puede bajar la DEF. ESP.

name: MANTO ESPEJO
description: Responde a un ATAQUE\nESPECIAL con doble fuerza.

name: MÁS PSIQUE
description: Copia los efectos del rival\ny te los adjudica.

name: VEL. EXTREMA
description: Ataque extremadamente\nrápido y demoledor.

name: PODER PASADO
description: Puede subir todas\nlas características.

name: BOLA SOMBRA
description: Lanza una bola negra que\npuede bajar la DEF. ESP.

name: PREMONICIÓN
description: Aumenta la energía interior\npara golpear a los 2 turnos.

name: GOLPE ROCA
description: Ataque de fuerza brutal\nque puede bajar la DEFENSA.

name: TORBELLINO
description: Atrapa y daña al rival de 2 a\n5 turnos con un torbellino.

name: PALIZA
description: Ataque de todo el\nequipo POKéMON.

name: SORPRESA
description: Ataca primero en un turno\ny puede causar retroceso.

name: ALBOROTO
description: Alborota de 2 a 5 turnos.\nMantiene despierto.

name: RESERVA
description: Recarga energía hasta\n3 veces.

name: ESCUPIR
description: Libera energía acumulada.\nCuanta más, mejor.

name: TRAGAR
description: Absorbe energía acumulada\ny restaura PS.

name: ONDA ÍGNEA
description: Exhala un vaho ígneo que\npuede quemar al rival.

name: GRANIZO
description: Tormenta de granizo que\ngolpea en cada turno.

name: TORMENTO
description: Agobia e impide el uso\nreiterado de un ataque.

name: CAMELO
description: Confunde al rival, pero\nsube su AT. ESP.

name: FUEGO FATUO
description: Fuego muy intenso que\nproduce quemaduras.

name: LEGADO
description: Baja las habilidades\ndel rival y te fulmina.

name: IMAGEN
description: Potencia el ATAQUE al estar\nquemado, paraliz. o enven.

name: PUÑO CERTERO
description: Es tardío, pero si el rival\nte golpea no te moverás.

name: ESTÍMULO
description: Afecta a rivales paraliza-\ndos, pero también los cura.

name: SEÑUELO
description: Llama la atención para\nconcentrar los ataques.

name: ADAPTACIÓN
description: El tipo de ataque\nvaría según el sitio.

name: CARGA
description: Recarga energía y sube el\nataque eléctrico posterior.

name: MOFA
description: Hace que el rival sólo\nuse ataques.

name: REFUERZO
description: Refuerza los movimientos\ndel receptor.

name: TRUCO
description: Engaña al rival y provoca\nun cambio de objeto.

name: IMITACIÓN
description: Imita al rival y copia\nsu HABILIDAD ESPECIAL.

name: DESEO
description: Lleva tiempo, pero cumple el\ndeseo de restaurar los PS.

name: AYUDA
description: Ataque elegido al azar\nde un miembro del equipo.

name: ARRAIGO
description: Echa raíces para recuperar\nPS, pero impide el relevo.

name: FUERZA BRUTA
description: Aumenta mucho la fuerza,\npero las habilidades bajan.

name: CAPA MÁGICA
description: El agresor recibe el reflejo\nde los efectos especiales.

name: RECICLAJE
description: Recicla un objeto usado\npara utilizarlo de nuevo.

name: DESQUITE
description: Ataque que gana fuerza\nsi el enemigo te hiere.

name: DEMOLICIÓN
description: Destruye barreras como\nREFLEJO y causa daño.

name: BOSTEZO
description: Provoca el bostezo\ny después el sueño.

name: DESARME
description: Deja al rival desprovisto\ndel objeto que lleva.

name: ESFUERZO
description: Gana fuerza si el atacante\ntiene menos PS que el rival.

name: ESTALLIDO
description: Cuanto mayor sea el número\nde tus PS, más daño harás.

name: INTERCAMBIO
description: Intercambia la habilidad\nespecial con otro POKéMON.

name: CERCA
description: Impide al rival usar ataques\nque tú conoces.

name: ALIVIO
description: Cura envenenamientos,\nparálisis y quemaduras.

name: RABIA
description: Si te debilitas, borra los PP\ndel último ataque del rival.

name: ROBO
description: Roba el efecto del ataque\nque el rival use después.

name: DAÑO SECRETO
description: Los efectos de este ataque\nvarían según la zona.

name: BUCEO
description: 1.ᵉʳ turno: bucea.\n2.º: golpea.

name: EMPUJÓN
description: Se dan puñetazos directos\nde 2 a 5 turnos.

name: CAMUFLAJE
description: Modifica el tipo del POKéMON\nsegún la zona donde esté.

name: RÁFAGA
description: Ráfaga de luz que sube\nmuchísimo el AT. ESP.

name: RESPLANDOR
description: Fogonazo de luz que puede\nbajar la DEF. ESP.

name: BOLA NEBLINA
description: Banco de niebla que\npuede bajar el AT. ESP.

name: DANZA PLUMA
description: Envuelve al rival con plumón\npara reducir su ATAQUE.

name: DANZA CAOS
description: Confunde a todos los\nPOKéMON que hay en escena.

name: PATADA ÍGNEA
description: Suele ser un golpe crítico\ny causar quemaduras.

name: CHAPOTEOLODO
description: Te cubre de lodo y mejora\ntu resistencia eléctrica.

name: BOLA HIELO
description: Dura 5 turnos y gana fuerza\nen cada uno.

name: BRAZO PINCHO
description: Pega con brazos de pinchos\ny puede causar retroceso.

name: RELAJO
description: Te relaja y restaura la\nmitad de los PS máximos.

name: VOZARRÓN
description: Ondas sonoras de alta\nfrecuencia que hieren.

name: COLMILLO VEN
description: Incisivos colmillos que\npueden envenenar al rival.

name: GARRA BRUTAL
description: Hace trizas al enemigo y\npuede bajar la DEFENSA.

name: ANILLO ÍGNEO
description: Es muy eficaz, pero\nte inmoviliza 1 turno.

name: HIDROCAÑÓN
description: Es muy eficaz, pero\nte inmoviliza 1 turno.

name: PUÑO METEORO
description: Impacta como un meteorito\ny suele subir el ATAQUE.

name: IMPRESIONAR
description: Impresiona tanto que puede\nhacer retroceder al rival.

name: METEOROBOLA
description: El tipo y fuerza del ataque\nvarían según el clima.

name: AROMATERAPIA
description: Cura todos los problemas de\nestado con un suave aroma.

name: LLANTO FALSO
description: Lágrimas de cocodrilo que\nbajan mucho la DEF. ESP.

name: AIRE AFILADO
description: Viento cortante que azota.\nSuele ser un golpe crítico.

name: SOFOCO
description: Ataque en toda regla que\nbaja mucho tu AT. ESP.

name: RASTREO
description: Anula los intentos del rival\npor aumentar la EVASIÓN.

name: TUMBA ROCAS
description: Tira rocas al rival, lo para\ny suele bajarle VELOCIDAD.

name: VIENTO PLATA
description: Partículas de plata que\nquizá suban las habilidades.

name: ECO METÁLICO
description: Tremendo chirrido que baja\nmucho la DEF. ESP.

name: SILBATO
description: Agradable melodía que\nadormece al rival.

name: COSQUILLAS
description: Hace reír para bajar el\nATAQUE y la DEFENSA.

name: MASA CÓSMICA
description: Sube la DEFENSA y la DEF.\nESP. con energía mística.

name: SALPICAR
description: Si tienes muchos PS, el daño\nque causa es mucho mayor.

name: DOBLE RAYO
description: Extraño ataque con rayo.\nPuede causar confusión.

name: PUÑO SOMBRA
description: Puñetazo ineludible\nprocedente de las sombras.

name: PARANORMAL
description: Energía muy extraña que\npuede causar el retroceso.

name: GANCHO ALTO
description: Gancho ascendente de gran\nímpetu.

name: BUCLE ARENA
description: Enreda en un remolino\nde arena de 2 a 5 turnos.

name: FRÍO POLAR
description: Ataque polar que debilita\nal rival si le alcanza.

name: AGUA LODOSA
description: Ataque con agua lodosa que\npuede bajar la PRECISIÓN.

name: RECURRENTE
description: Dispara de 2 a 5 ráfagas\nconsecutivas de semillas.

name: GOLPE AÉREO
description: Ataque tremendamente\nrápido e ineludible.

name: CARÁMBANO
description: Ataca lanzando de 2 a 5\nráfagas de carámbanos.

name: DEF. FÉRREA
description: Te fortalece y sube\nmucho la DEFENSA.

name: BLOQUEO
description: Le corta el paso al rival\npara que no pueda escapar.

name: AULLIDO
description: Aullido que sube el ánimo\ny aumenta el ATAQUE.

name: GARRA DRAGÓN
description: Araña al rival con garras\nafiladas.

name: PLANTA FEROZ
description: Es eficaz, pero deja\ninmóvil al agresor 1 turno.

name: CORPULENCIA
description: Robustece el cuerpo para\nsubir ATAQUE y DEFENSA.

name: BOTE
description: 1.ᵉʳ turno: bota.\n2.º: golpea. Puede paralizar.

name: DISP. LODO
description: Dispara lodo al rival y\nreduce su VELOCIDAD.

name: COLA VENENO
description: Puede envenenar y dar un\ngolpe crítico.

name: ANTOJO
description: Pide con ternura al rival\nel objeto que lleve.

name: PLACAJE ELÉC
description: Placaje de alto riesgo que\nhiere un poco al atacante.

name: HOJA MÁGICA
description: Ataca con una extraña hoja\nque no se puede esquivar.

name: HIDROCHORRO
description: Te moja para que resistas\nmás los ataques de fuego.

name: PAZ MENTAL
description: Sube el AT. ESP. y la DEF.\nESP. con concentración.

name: HOJA AGUDA
description: Acuchilla con una hoja fina.\nSuele dar un golpe crítico.

name: DANZA DRAGÓN
description: Danza mística que sube\nel ATAQUE y la VELOCIDAD.

name: PEDRADA
description: Lanza pedruscos al rival de\n2 a 5 veces consecutivas.

name: ONDA VOLTIO
description: Ataque eléctrico muy rápido\ne ineludible.

name: HIDROPULSO
description: Ondas ultrasónicas que\npueden confundir al rival.

name: DESEO OCULTO
description: Concentra intensa luz solar\ny ataca 2 turnos después.

name: PSICOATAQUE
description: Es tremendamente potente,\npero baja mucho el AT. ESP.

name: はたく
description:
ながい しっぽや
てなどを つかって
あいてを はたいて
こうげきする。

name: からてチョップ
description:
するどい チョップで
あいてを たたいて
こうげきする。
きゅうしょに あたる
かくりつが たかい。

name: おうふくビンタ
description:
おうふく ビンタで
あいてを たたいて
こうげきする。
2ー5かい れんぞくで
ダメージを あたえる。

name: れんぞくパンチ
description:
どとうの パンチで
あいてを なぐりつけて
こうげきする。
2ー5かい れんぞくで
ダメージを あたえる。

name: メガトンパンチ
description:
ちからを こめた
パンチを くりだして
あいてを なぐりつけて
こうげきする。

name: ネコにこばん
description:
こばんを たくさん
あいてに なげつけて
こうげきする。
せんとうの あとで
おかねが てにはいる。

name: ほのおのパンチ
description:
ほのおを こめた
パンチで あいてを
こうげきする。
やけど じょうたいに
することが ある。

name: れいとうパンチ
description:
れいきを こめた
パンチで あいてを
こうげきする。
こおり じょうたいに
することが ある。

name: かみなりパンチ
description:
でんげきを こめた
パンチで あいてを
こうげきする。
まひ じょうたいに
することが ある。

name: ひっかく
description:
かたくて とがった
するどい ツメで
あいてを ひっかいて
こうげきする。

name: はさむ
description:
おおきくて りっぱな
ハサミを つかって
あいてを はさんで
こうげきする。

name: ハサミギロチン
description:
おおきな ハサミで
あいてを きりさいて
こうげきする。
あたれば いちげきで
あいては たおれる。

name: かまいたち
description:
つくりだした かぜの
やいばで 2ターンめに
こうげきする。
きゅうしょに あたる
かくりつが たかい。

name: つるぎのまい
description:
たたかいの おどりを
はげしく おどって
きあいを たかめ
じぶんの こうげきを
グーンと あげる。

name: いあいぎり
description:
カマや ツメなどで
あいてを きりつけて
こうげきする。
ほそい きや くさを
きることも できる。

name: かぜおこし
description:
つばさで おこした
はげしい かぜを
あいてに ぶつけて
こうげきする。

name: つばさでうつ
description:
おおきく ひろげた
りっぱな つばさを
あいてに ぶつけて
こうげきする。

name: ふきとばし
description:
あいてを ふきとばし
ひかえの ポケモンを
むりやり ひきだす。
やせいの ばあいは
せんとうが おわる。

name: そらをとぶ
description:
1ターンめで そらに
とんで 2ターンめに
こうげきする。
しっている まちに
とぶことも できる。

name: しめつける
description:
ながい からだや
つるなどを つかって
2ー5ターンの あいだ
あいてを しめつけて
こうげきする。

name: たたきつける
description:
ながい しっぽや
つるなどを つかって
あいてを たたきつけて
こうげきする。

name: つるのムチ
description:
ムチの ように しなる
ほそながい つるを
あいてに たたきつけて
こうげきする。

name: ふみつけ
description:
おおきな あしで
あいてを ふみつけて
こうげきする。
あいてを ひるませる
ことが ある。

name: にどげり
description:
2ほんの あしで
あいてを けとばして
こうげきする。
2かい れんぞくで
ダメージを あたえる。

name: メガトンキック
description:
ものすごい ちからを
こめた キックで
あいてを けとばして
こうげきする。

name: とびげり
description:
たかい ジャンプからの
キックで あいてを
こうげきする。
はずすと じぶんが
ダメージを うける。

name: まわしげり
description:
からだを かいてんさせ
キックを くりだして
こうげきする。
あいてを ひるませる
ことが ある。

name: すなかけ
description:
たいりょうの すなを
かおに かけ めを
くらまして あいての
めいちゅうを さげる。

name: ずつき
description:
あたまを つきだし
まっすぐ つっこんで
こうげきする。
あいてを ひるませる
ことが ある。

name: つのでつく
description:
するどく とがった
つのを つかって
あいてを つついて
こうげきする。

name: みだれづき
description:
つのや くちばしで
あいてを つついて
こうげきする。
2ー5かい れんぞくで
ダメージを あたえる。

name: つのドリル
description:
つのを かいてんさせて
あいてに つきさして
こうげきする。
あたれば いちげきで
あいては たおれる。

name: たいあたり
description:
あいてに むかって
からだ ぜんたいで
つっこんで いって
こうげきする。

name: のしかかり
description:
からだ ぜんたいで
あいてに のしかかって
こうげきする。
まひ じょうたいに
することが ある。

name: まきつく
description:
ながい からだや
つるなどを つかって
2ー5ターンの あいだ
あいてに まきついて
こうげきする。

name: とっしん
description:
すごい いきおいで
あいてに つっこんで
こうげきする。
じぶんも すこし
ダメージを うける。

name: あばれる
description:
2ー3ターンの あいだ
あばれ まくって
こうげきする。
あばれた あとは
こんらん してしまう。

name: すてみタックル
description:
いのちを かけて
てきに つっこんで
こうげきする。
じぶんも すこし
ダメージを うける。

name: しっぽをふる
description:
しっぽを さゆうに
かわいく ふって
ゆだんさせて てきの
ぼうぎょを さげる。

name: どくばり
description:
どくの ある ハリを
あいてに つきさして
こうげきする。
どく じょうたいに
することが ある。

name: ダブルニードル
description:
りょうての ハリで
2かい れんぞくで
こうげきする。
どく じょうたいに
することが ある。

name: ミサイルばり
description:
するどい ハリを
あいてに はっしゃして
こうげきする。
2ー5かい れんぞくで
ダメージを あたえる。

name: にらみつける
description:
するどい めつきで
じっと にらみつけ
おびえさせて てきの
ぼうぎょを さげる。

name: かみつく
description:
するどく とがった
はで かみついて
こうげきする。
あいてを ひるませる
ことが ある。

name: なきごえ
description:
かわいい なきごえを
きかせて きを ひき
ゆだんさせて てきの
こうげきを さげる。

name: ほえる
description:
あいてを にげださせて
ひかえの ポケモンを
むりやり ひきだす。

2ー5かい れんぞくで
ダメージを あたえる。

name: ほごしょく
description:
つかった ばしょに
よって じぶんの
タイプが いろいろ
へんかする。

name: ほたるび
description:
やさしく てんめつする
ひかりを ながめ
せいしんを とういつし
じぶんの とくこうを
グーンと あげる。

name: ラスターパージ
description:
まばゆい ひかりを
いっきに かいほうして
こうげきする。
あいての とくぼうを
さげることが ある。

name: ミストボール
description:
きりじょうの こまかい
うもうで つつみこみ
こうげきする。
あいての とくこうを
さげることが ある。

name: フェザーダンス
description:
こまかい うもうを
たいりょうに ふりまき
からだに からませて
あいての こうげきを
ガクッと さげる。

name: フラフラダンス
description:
フラフラした ダンスを
おどって せんとうに
でている すべての
ポケモンを こんらんの
じょうたいに する。

name: ブレイズキック
description:
こうげきした あいてを
やけど じょうたいに
することが あり
きゅうしょに あたる
かくりつも たかい。

name: どろあそび
description:
どろを かぶって
どろどろに なり
じぶんが いるあいだ
でんきタイプの わざの
ダメージを へらす。

name: アイスボール
description:
5ターンの あいだ
あいてに ころがって
こうげきする。
ころがる たびに
ダメージが ふえる。

name: ニードルアーム
description:
トゲが たくさん ある
うでで なぐりつけて
こうげきする。
あいてを ひるませる
ことが ある。

name: なまける
description:
なまけて やすむことで
じぶんの HPを
さいだい HPの
はんぶんだけ
かいふくする。

name: ハイパーボイス
description:
うるさく ひびく
おおごえの しんどうを
てきに あたえて
こうげきする。

name: どくどくのキバ
description:
どくの ある キバで
あいてに かみついて
こうげきする。
もうどく じょうたいに
することが ある。

name: ブレイククロー
description:
かたく するどい
ツメで きりさいて
こうげきする。
あいての ぼうぎょを
さげることが ある。

name: ブラストバーン
description:
すさまじい ばくはつで
あいてを やきつくして
こうげきする。
つぎの ターンは
うごけなく なる。

name: ハイドロカノン
description:
みずの たいほうを
あいてに はっしゃして
こうげきする。
つぎの ターンは
うごけなく なる。

name: コメットパンチ
description:
すいせいの ごとく
パンチを くりだして
こうげきする。
じぶんの こうげきが
あがることが ある。

name: おどろかす
description:
おおきな こえなどで
きゅうに おどろかせて
こうげきする。
あいてを ひるませる
ことが ある。

name: ウェザーボール
description:
つかった ときの
てんきに よって
あいてに あたえる
ダメージの りょうと
タイプが へんかする。

name: アロマセラピー
description:
やすらぐ ここちよい
かおりを かがせて
みかた ぜんいんの
じょうたい いじょうを
かいふくする。

name: うそなき
description:
ないた ふりを して
なみだを ながし
こまらせる ことで
あいての とくぼうを
ガクッと さげる。

name: エアカッター
description:
するどい かぜで
てきを きりつけて
こうげきする。
きゅうしょに あたる
かくりつが たかい。

name: オーバーヒート
description:
あいてを フルパワーで
こうげきする。
つかうと はんどうで
じぶんの とくこうが
ガクッと さがる。

name: かぎわける
description:
かいひりつが あがって
わざを あてにくく
なってしまって いる
あいての かいひりつを
もとに もどす。

name: がんせきふうじ
description:
いわを もちあげ
あいてに なげつけて
こうげきする。
どうじに あいての
すばやさを さげる。

name: ぎんいろのかぜ
description:
ぎんいろの りんぷんで
こうげきする。
どうじに じぶんの
すべての のうりょくが
あがることが ある。

name: きんぞくおん
description:
きんぞくを こすって
でるような いやな
おとを きかせて
あいての とくぼうを
ガクッと さげる。

name: くさぶえ
description:
ここちよい くさぶえの
ねいろを きかせて
あいてを ねむりの
じょうたいに する。

name: くすぐる
description:
コチョコチョと
からだを くすぐり
わらわせる ことで
あいての こうげきと
ぼうぎょを さげる。

name: コスモパワー
description:
うちゅう からの
しんぴてきな ちからを
とりこむ ことで
じぶんの ぼうぎょと
とくぼうを あげる。

name: しおふき
description:
あたまから しおを
ふいて こうげきする。
HPが おおいほど
あいてに おおきな
ダメージを あたえる。

name: シグナルビーム
description:
てんめつする ひかりを
あいてに はっしゃして
こうげきする。
こんらん じょうたいに
することが ある。

name: シャドーパンチ
description:
かげに まぎれて
パンチを くりだして
こうげきする。
あいては ぜったいに
よけられない。

name: じんつうりき
description:
みえない ふしぎな
ちからを おくって
こうげきする。
あいてを ひるませる
ことが ある。

name: スカイアッパー
description:
そらに むかうような
ものすごい アッパーで
あいてを つきあげて
こうげきする。

name: すなじごく
description:
はげしく ふきあれる
すなあらしの なかに
2ー5ターンの あいだ
あいてを とじこめ
こうげきする。

name: ぜったいれいど
description:
きょくげんの さむさを
あいてに あたえて
こうげきする。
あたれば いちげきで
あいては たおれる。

name: だくりゅう
description:
にごった みずを
はげしく たたきつけて
こうげきする。
てきの めいちゅうを
さげることが ある。

name: タネマシンガン
description:
タネを いきおいよく
あいてに はっしゃして
こうげきする。
2ー5かい れんぞくで
ダメージを あたえる。

name: つばめがえし
description:
すばやい うごきで
あいてを ほんろうして
こうげきする。
あいては ぜったいに
よけられない。

name: つららばり
description:
するどい つららを
あいてに はっしゃして
こうげきする。
2ー5かい れんぞくで
ダメージを あたえる。

name: てっぺき
description:
からだの ひょうめんを
てつの ように
かたくする ことで
じぶんの ぼうぎょを
グーンと あげる。

name: とおせんぼう
description:
りょうてを ひろげて
まえに たちはだかり
にげみちを ふさいで
あいてを せんとうから
にげられなく する。

name: とおぼえ
description:
おおきな こえで
ほえて きあいを
たかめ じぶんの
こうげきを あげる。

name: ドラゴンクロー
description:
するどく とがった
きょだいな ツメで
あいてを きりさいて
こうげきする。

name: ハードプラント
description:
きょだいな じゅもくを
あいてに たたきつけて
こうげきする。
つぎの ターンは
うごけなく なる。

name: ビルドアップ
description:
からだに ちからを
こめて きんにくを
ぶあつく することで
じぶんの こうげきと
ぼうぎょを あげる。

name: とびはねる
description:
そらたかく とびはね
2ターンめに あいてを
こうげきする。
まひ じょうたいに
することが ある。

name: マッドショット
description:
どろの かたまりを
あいてに なげつけて
こうげきする。
どうじに あいての
すばやさを さげる。

name: ポイズンテール
description:
こうげきした あいてを
どく じょうたいに
することが あり
きゅうしょに あたる
かくりつも たかい。

name: ほしがる
description:
かわいく あまえながら
ちかづいて いって
あいてが もっている
どうぐを うばう。

name: ボルテッカー
description:
でんきを まとい
あいてに つっこんで
こうげきする。
じぶんも すこし
ダメージを うける。

name: マジカルリーフ
description:
あいてを ついせきする
ふしぎな はっぱで
こうげきする。
こうげきは かならず
めいちゅう する。

name: みずあそび
description:
みずを かぶって
びしょびしょに なり
じぶんが いるあいだ
ほのおタイプの わざの
ダメージを へらす。

name: めいそう
description:
しずかに せいしんを
とういつして こころを
しずめる ことで
じぶんの とくこうと
とくぼうを あげる。

name: リーフブレード
description:
とがった はっぱで
あいてを きりつけて
こうげきする。
きゅうしょに あたる
かくりつが たかい。

name: りゅうのまい
description:
とても しんぴてきで 
ちからづよい まいを
はげしく おどって
じぶんの こうげきと
すばやさを あげる。

name: ロックブラスト
description:
かたい いわを
あいてに はっしゃして
こうげきする。
2ー5かい れんぞくで
ダメージを あたえる。

name: でんげきは
description:
すばやい でんげきを
あいてに はっしゃして
こうげきする。
あいては ぜったいに
よけられない。

name: みずのはどう
description:
みずの しんどうを
あいてに あたえて
こうげきする。
こんらん じょうたいに
することが ある。

name: はめつのねがい
description:
わざを つかった
2ターン あとに
たくさんの ひかりを
あいてに ふりそそいで
こうげきする。

name: サイコブースト
description:
あいてを フルパワーで
こうげきする。
つかうと はんどうで
じぶんの とくこうが
ガクッと さがる。

name: POUND
description:
A physical attack
delivered with a
long tail or a
foreleg, etc.

name: KARATE CHOP
description:
The foe is attacked
with a sharp chop.
It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: DOUBLESLAP
description:
The foe is slapped
repeatedly, back
and forth, two to
five times.

name: COMET PUNCH
description:
The foe is hit with
a flurry of punches
that strike two to
five times.

name: MEGA PUNCH
description:
The foe is slugged
by a punch thrown
with muscle-packed
power.

name: PAY DAY
description:
Numerous coins are
hurled at the foe.
Money is earned
after battle.

name: FIRE PUNCH
description:
The foe is punched
with a fiery fist.
It may leave the
foe with a burn.

name: ICE PUNCH
description:
The foe is punched
with an icy fist.
It may leave the
foe frozen.

name: THUNDERPUNCH
description:
The foe is punched
with an electrified
fist. It may leave
the foe paralyzed.

name: SCRATCH
description: Hard, pointed, and\nsharp claws rake\nthe foe.

name: VICEGRIP
description: Huge, impressive\npincers grip and\nsqueeze the foe.

name: GUILLOTINE
description:
A vicious tearing
attack with pincers.
The foe will faint
if it hits.

name: RAZOR WIND
description:
Blades of wind hit
the foe on the 2nd
turn. It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: SWORDS DANCE
description:
A frenetic dance of
fighting. It sharply
raises the ATTACK
stat.

name: CUT
description:
A basic attack.
It can be used to
cut down thin trees
and grass.

name: GUST
description:
Strikes the foe
with a gust of wind
whipped up by
wings.

name: WING ATTACK
description: The foe is struck\nwith large, imposing\nwings spread wide.

name: WHIRLWIND
description:
The foe is made to
switch out with an
ally. In the wild,
the battle ends.

name: FLY
description:
A 2-turn move that
hits on the 2nd
turn. Use it to fly
to any known town.

name: BIND
description:
A long body or
tentacles are used
to bind the foe for
two to five turns.

name: SLAM
description: The foe is struck\nwith a long tail,\nvines, etc.

name: VINE WHIP
description: The foe is struck\nwith slender, whip-\nlike vines.

name: STOMP
description:
The foe is stomped
with a big foot.
It may make the
foe flinch.

name: DOUBLE KICK
description:
Two legs are used
to quickly kick the
foe twice in one
turn.

name: MEGA KICK
description:
The foe is attacked
by a kick fired
with muscle-packed
power.

name: JUMP KICK
description:
The user jumps up
high, then kicks.
If it misses, the
user hurts itself.

name: ROLLING KICK
description:
A quick kick from a
rolling spin.
It may make the
foe flinch.

name: SAND-ATTACK
description:
A lot of sand is
hurled in the foe’s
face, reducing its
accuracy.

name: HEADBUTT
description:
The user sticks its
head out and rams.
It may make the
foe flinch.

name: HORN ATTACK
description:
The foe is jabbed
with a sharply
pointed horn to
inflict damage.

name: FURY ATTACK
description:
The foe is jabbed
repeatedly with a
horn or beak two to
five times.

name: HORN DRILL
description:
The horn is rotated
like a drill to ram.
The foe will faint
if it hits.

name: TACKLE
description:
A physical attack
in which the user
charges, full body,
into the foe.

name: BODY SLAM
description:
The user drops its
full body on the
foe. It may leave
the foe paralyzed.

name: WRAP
description:
A long body or
vines are used to
wrap the foe for
two to five turns.

name: TAKE DOWN
description:
A reckless, full-
body charge attack
that also hurts the
user a little.

name: THRASH
description:
The user rampages
about for two to
three turns, then
becomes confused.

name: DOUBLE-EDGE
description:
A reckless, life-
risking tackle that
also hurts the user
a little.

name: TAIL WHIP
description:
The user wags its
tail cutely, making
the foe lower its
DEFENSE stat.

name: POISON STING
description:
The foe is stabbed
with a toxic barb,
etc. It may poison
the foe.

name: TWINEEDLE
description:
The foe is stabbed
twice with foreleg
stingers. It may
poison the foe.

name: PIN MISSILE
description:
Sharp pins are shot
at the foe and hit
two to five times
at once.

name: LEER
description:
The foe is given an
intimidating look
that lowers its
DEFENSE stat.

name: BITE
description:
The user bites with
vicious fangs.
It may make the
foe flinch.

name: GROWL
description:
The user growls in
a cute way, making
the foe lower its
ATTACK stat.

name: ROAR
description:
The foe is made to
switch out with an
ally. In the wild,
the battle ends.

name: SING
description:
A soothing song
in a calming voice
lulls the foe into
a deep slumber.

name: SUPERSONIC
description:
The user generates
odd sound waves.
It may confuse the
foe.

name: SONICBOOM
description:
The foe is hit with
a shock wave that
always inflicts 20-
HP damage.

name: DISABLE
description:
For a few turns,
it prevents the foe
from using the move
it last used.

name: ACID
description:
The foe is sprayed
with a harsh, hide-
melting acid that
may lower DEFENSE.

name: EMBER
description:
The foe is attacked
with small flames.
The foe may suffer
a burn.

name: FLAMETHROWER
description:
The foe is scorched
with intense flames.
The foe may suffer
a burn.

name: MIST
description:
The ally party is
protected by a
mist that prevents
stat reductions.

name: WATER GUN
description:
The foe is struck
with a lot of water
expelled forcibly
from the mouth.

name: HYDRO PUMP
description:
A high volume of
water is blasted at
the foe under great
pressure.

name: SURF
description:
A big wave crashes
down on the foe.
Can also be used
for crossing water.

name: ICE BEAM
description:
The foe is struck
with an icy beam.
It may freeze the
foe solid.

name: BLIZZARD
description:
The foe is blasted
with a blizzard.
It may freeze the
foe solid.

name: PSYBEAM
description:
A peculiar ray is
shot at the foe.
It may leave the
foe confused.

name: BUBBLEBEAM
description:
A spray of bubbles
strikes the foe.
It may lower the
foe’s SPEED stat.

name: AURORA BEAM
description:
A rainbow-colored
attack beam.
It may lower the
foe’s ATTACK stat.

name: HYPER BEAM
description:
A severely damaging
attack that makes
the user rest on
the next turn.

name: PECK
description:
The foe is jabbed
with a sharply
pointed beak or
horn.

name: DRILL PECK
description:
A corkscrewing
attack with the
sharp beak acting
as a drill.

name: SUBMISSION
description:
A reckless, full-
body throw attack
that also hurts the
user a little.

name: LOW KICK
description:
A low, tripping kick
that inflicts more
damage on heavier
foes.

name: COUNTER
description:
A retaliation move
that counters any
physical hit with
double the damage.

name: SEISMIC TOSS
description:
A gravity-fed throw
that causes damage
matching the user’s
level.

name: STRENGTH
description:
The foe is slugged
at maximum power.
Can also be used
to move boulders.

name: ABSORB
description:
An attack that
absorbs half the
damage it inflicted
to restore HP.

name: MEGA DRAIN
description:
A tough attack that
drains half the
damage it inflicted
to restore HP.

name: LEECH SEED
description:
A seed is planted
on the foe to steal
some HP for the 
user on every turn.

name: GROWTH
description:
The user’s body is
forced to grow,
raising the SP.
ATK stat.

name: RAZOR LEAF
description:
The foe is hit with
a cutting leaf.
It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: SOLARBEAM
description:
A 2-turn move that
blasts the foe with
absorbed energy in
the 2nd turn.

name: POISONPOWDER
description:
A cloud of toxic
dust is scattered.
It may poison the
foe.

name: STUN SPORE
description:
Paralyzing dust is
scattered wildly.
It may paralyze
the foe.

name: SLEEP POWDER
description:
A sleep-inducing
dust is scattered
in high volume
around a foe.

name: PETAL DANCE
description:
The user attacks
with petals for two
to three turns,
then gets confused.

name: STRING SHOT
description:
The foe is bound
with strings shot
from the mouth to
reduce its SPEED.

name: DRAGON RAGE
description:
The foe is hit with
a shock wave that
always inflicts 40-
HP damage.

name: FIRE SPIN
description:
The foe is trapped
in an intense spiral
of fire that rages
two to five turns.

name: THUNDERSHOCK
description:
An electric shock
attack that may
also leave the foe
paralyzed.

name: THUNDERBOLT
description:
A strong electrical
attack that may
also leave the foe
paralyzed.

name: THUNDER WAVE
description:
A weak electric
shock that is sure
to cause paralysis
if it hits.

name: THUNDER
description:
A brutal lightning
attack that may
also leave the foe
paralyzed.

name: ROCK THROW
description:
The foe is attacked
with a shower of
small, easily
thrown rocks.

name: EARTHQUAKE
description:
An earthquake that
strikes all POKéMON
in battle excluding
the user.

name: FISSURE
description:
The foe is dropped
into a fissure.
The foe faints if it
hits.

name: DIG
description:
An attack that hits
on the 2nd turn.
Can also be used
to exit dungeons.

name: TOXIC
description:
A move that badly
poisons the foe.
Its poison damage
worsens every turn.

name: CONFUSION
description:
A weak telekinetic
attack that may
also leave the foe
confused.

name: PSYCHIC
description:
A strong telekinetic
attack. It may also
lower the foe’s
SP. DEF stat.

name: HYPNOSIS
description:
Hypnotic suggestion
is used to make the
foe fall into a
deep sleep.

name: MEDITATE
description:
The user meditates
to awaken its power
and raise its
ATTACK stat.

name: AGILITY
description:
The user relaxes
and lightens its
body to sharply
boost its SPEED.

name: QUICK ATTACK
description:
An almost invisibly
fast attack that
is certain to strike
first.

name: RAGE
description:
An attack that
becomes stronger
each time the user
is hit in battle.

name: TELEPORT
description:
Use it to flee from
any wild POKéMON.
Also warps to the
last POKé CENTER.

name: NIGHT SHADE
description:
An attack with a
mirage that inflicts
damage matching
the user’s level.

name: MIMIC
description:
The user copies the
move last used by
the foe for the
rest of the battle.

name: SCREECH
description:
An ear-splitting
screech is emitted
to sharply reduce
the foe’s DEFENSE.

name: DOUBLE TEAM
description:
The user creates
illusory copies of
itself to raise its
evasiveness.

name: RECOVER
description:
A self-healing move
that restores HP by
up to half of the
user’s maximum HP.

name: HARDEN
description:
The user stiffens
all the muscles in
its body to raise
its DEFENSE stat.

name: MINIMIZE
description:
The user compresses
all the cells in its
body to raise its
evasiveness.

name: SMOKESCREEN
description:
An obscuring cloud
of smoke or ink
reduces the foe’s
accuracy.

name: CONFUSE RAY
description:
The foe is exposed
to a sinister ray
that triggers
confusion.

name: WITHDRAW
description:
The user withdraws
its body in its hard
shell, raising its
DEFENSE stat.

name: DEFENSE CURL
description:
The user curls up
to conceal weak
spots and raise its
DEFENSE stat.

name: BARRIER
description:
The user creates a
sturdy wall that
sharply raises its
DEFENSE stat.

name: LIGHT SCREEN
description:
A wall of light
cuts damage from
SP. ATK attacks
for five turns.

name: HAZE
description:
Eliminates all stat
changes among all
POKéMON engaged in
battle.

name: REFLECT
description:
A wall of light
cuts damage from
physical attacks
for five turns.

name: FOCUS ENERGY
description:
The user takes a
deep breath and
focuses to raise its
critical-hit ratio.

name: BIDE
description:
The user endures
attacks for two
turns, then strikes
back double.

name: METRONOME
description:
Waggles a finger
and stimulates the
brain into using any
move at random.

name: MIRROR MOVE
description:
The user counters
the move last used
by the foe with the
same move.

name: SELFDESTRUCT
description:
The user blows up
to inflict severe
damage, even
making itself faint.

name: EGG BOMB
description:
A large egg is
hurled with great
force at the foe to
inflict damage.

name: LICK
description:
The foe is licked
and hit with a long
tongue. It may
also paralyze.

name: SMOG
description:
The foe is attacked
with exhaust gases.
It may also poison
the foe.

name: SLUDGE
description:
Toxic sludge is
hurled at the foe.
It may poison the
target.

name: BONE CLUB
description:
The foe is clubbed
with a bone held in
hand. It may make
the foe flinch.

name: FIRE BLAST
description:
The foe is hit with
an intense flame.
It may leave the
target with a burn.

name: WATERFALL
description:
A powerful charge
attack. It can also
be used to climb
a waterfall.

name: CLAMP
description:
The foe is clamped
and squeezed by
the user’s shell for
two to five turns.

name: SWIFT
description:
Star-shaped rays
that never miss are
fired at all foes in
battle.

name: SKULL BASH
description:
The user raises its
DEFENSE in the 1st
turn, then attacks
in the 2nd turn.

name: SPIKE CANNON
description:
Sharp spikes are
fired at the foe to
strike two to five
times.

name: CONSTRICT
description:
The foe is attacked
with long tentacles
or vines. It may
lower SPEED.

name: AMNESIA
description:
Forgets about
something and
sharply raises
SP. DEF.

name: KINESIS
description:
The user distracts
the foe by bending
a spoon. It may
lower accuracy.

name: SOFTBOILED
description:
Heals the user by
up to half its full
HP. It can be used
to heal an ally.

name: HI JUMP KICK
description:
A strong jumping
knee kick. If it
misses, the user is
hurt.

name: GLARE
description:
The user intimidates
the foe with the
design on its belly
to cause paralysis.

name: DREAM EATER
description:
Absorbs half the
damage it inflicted
on a sleeping foe
to restore HP.

name: POISON GAS
description:
The foe is sprayed
with a cloud of
toxic gas that may
poison the foe.

name: BARRAGE
description:
Round objects are
hurled at the foe
to strike two to
five times.

name: LEECH LIFE
description:
An attack that
absorbs half the
damage it inflicted
to restore HP.

name: LOVELY KISS
description:
The user forces a
kiss on the foe
with a scary face
that induces sleep.

name: SKY ATTACK
description:
A 2nd-turn attack
move with a high
critical-hit ratio.
The foe may flinch.

name: TRANSFORM
description:
The user transforms
into a copy of the
foe with even the
same move set.

name: BUBBLE
description:
A spray of bubbles
hits the foe.
It may lower the
foe’s SPEED stat.

name: DIZZY PUNCH
description:
The foe is hit with
a rhythmic punch
that may leave it
confused.

name: SPORE
description:
The user scatters
bursts of fine
spores that induce
sleep.

name: FLASH
description:
A blast of light
that cuts the foe’s
accuracy. It also
illuminates caves.

name: PSYWAVE
description:
The foe is attacked
with an odd, hot
energy wave that
varies in intensity.

name: SPLASH
description:
The user just flops
and splashes around
without having any
effect.

name: ACID ARMOR
description:
The user alters its
cells to liquefy
itself and sharply
raise DEFENSE.

name: CRABHAMMER
description:
A large pincer is
used to hammer the
foe. It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: EXPLOSION
description:
The user explodes
to inflict terrible
damage even while
fainting itself.

name: FURY SWIPES
description:
The foe is raked
with sharp claws or
scythes two to five
times.

name: BONEMERANG
description:
The user throws a
bone that hits the
foe once, then once
again on return.

name: REST
description:
The user sleeps for
two turns to fully
restore HP and heal
any status problem.

name: ROCK SLIDE
description:
Large boulders are
hurled at the foe.
It may make the
foe flinch.

name: HYPER FANG
description:
The foe is attacked
with sharp fangs.
It may make the
foe flinch.

name: SHARPEN
description:
The user reduces
its polygon count
to sharpen edges
and raise ATTACK.

name: CONVERSION
description:
The user changes
its type to match
the type of one of
its moves.

name: TRI ATTACK
description:
A simultaneous
3-beam attack that
may paralyze, burn,
or freeze the foe.

name: SUPER FANG
description:
The user attacks
with sharp fangs
and halves the
foe’s HP.

name: SLASH
description:
The foe is slashed
with claws, etc.
It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: SUBSTITUTE
description:
The user creates a
decoy using one-
quarter of its full
HP.

name: STRUGGLE
description:
An attack that is
used only if there
is no PP. It also
hurts the user.

name: SKETCH
description:
This move copies
the move last used
by the foe, then
disappears.

name: TRIPLE KICK
description:
A 3-kick attack
that becomes more
powerful with each
successive hit.

name: THIEF
description:
An attack that may
take the foe’s held
item if the user
isn’t holding one.

name: SPIDER WEB
description:
Ensnares the foe 
with sticky string
so it doesn’t flee
or switch out.

name: MIND READER
description:
The user predicts
the foe’s action to
ensure its next
attack hits.

name: NIGHTMARE
description:
A sleeping foe is
shown a nightmare
that inflicts some
damage every turn.

name: FLAME WHEEL
description:
The user makes a
fiery charge at the
foe. It may cause
a burn.

name: SNORE
description:
An attack that can
be used only while
asleep. It may
cause flinching.

name: CURSE
description:
A move that works
differently for the
GHOST-type and all
the other types.

name: FLAIL
description:
A desperate attack
that becomes more
powerful the less
HP the user has.

name: CONVERSION 2
description:
The user changes
type to make itself
resistant to the
last attack it took.

name: AEROBLAST
description:
A vortex of air is
shot at the foe.
It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: COTTON SPORE
description:
Cotton-like spores
cling to the foe,
sharply reducing
its SPEED stat.

name: REVERSAL
description:
An all-out attack
that becomes more
powerful the less
HP the user has.

name: SPITE
description:
A move that cuts
2 to 5 PP from the
move last used by
the foe.

name: POWDER SNOW
description:
Blasts the foe with
a snowy gust.
It may cause
freezing.

name: PROTECT
description:
Enables the user to
evade all attacks.
It may fail if used
in succession.

name: MACH PUNCH
description:
A punch thrown at
blinding speed.
It is certain to
strike first.

name: SCARY FACE
description:
Frightens the foe
with a scary face
to sharply reduce
its SPEED.

name: FAINT ATTACK
description:
The user draws up
close to the foe
disarmingly, then
hits without fail.

name: SWEET KISS
description:
The user kisses
the foe with sweet
cuteness that
causes confusion.

name: BELLY DRUM
description:
The user maximizes
its ATTACK stat at
the cost of half
its full HP.

name: SLUDGE BOMB
description:
Filthy sludge is
hurled at the foe.
It may poison the
target.

name: MUD-SLAP
description:
Mud is hurled in
the foe’s face to
inflict damage and
lower its accuracy.

name: OCTAZOOKA
description:
Ink is blasted in
the foe’s face or
eyes to damage and
lower accuracy.

name: SPIKES
description:
A trap of spikes is
laid around the
foe’s party to hurt
foes switching in.

name: ZAP CANNON
description:
An electric blast is
fired like a cannon
to inflict damage
and paralyze.

name: FORESIGHT
description:
Completely negates
the foe’s efforts to
heighten its ability
to evade.

name: DESTINY BOND
description:
If the user faints,
the foe delivering
the final hit also
faints.

name: PERISH SONG
description:
Any battler that
hears this faints
in three turns
unless it switches.

name: ICY WIND
description:
A chilling wind is
used to attack.
It also lowers the
SPEED stat.

name: DETECT
description:
Enables the user to
evade all attacks.
It may fail if used
in succession.

name: BONE RUSH
description:
The user strikes
the foe with a bone
in hand two to five
times.

name: LOCK-ON
description:
The user locks on
to the foe, making
the next move sure
to hit.

name: OUTRAGE
description:
The user thrashes
about for two to
three turns, then
becomes confused.

name: SANDSTORM
description:
A 5-turn sandstorm
that damages all
types except ROCK,
GROUND, and STEEL.

name: GIGA DRAIN
description:
A harsh attack that
absorbs half the
damage it inflicted
to restore HP.

name: ENDURE
description:
The user endures
any hit with 1 HP
left. It may fail if
used in succession.

name: CHARM
description:
The foe is charmed
by the user’s cute
appeals, sharply
cutting its ATTACK.

name: ROLLOUT
description:
A 5-turn rolling
attack that becomes
stronger each time
it hits.

name: FALSE SWIPE
description:
A restrained attack
that always leaves
the foe with at
least 1 HP.

name: SWAGGER
description:
A move that makes
the foe confused,
but also sharply
raises its ATTACK.

name: MILK DRINK
description:
Heals the user by
up to half its full
HP. It can be used
to heal an ally.

name: SPARK
description:
An electrically
charged tackle that
may also paralyze
the foe.

name: FURY CUTTER
description:
An attack that
grows stronger on
each successive
hit.

name: STEEL WING
description:
The foe is hit with
wings of steel.
It may also raise
the user’s DEFENSE.

name: MEAN LOOK
description:
The foe is fixed
with a mean look
that prevents it
from escaping.

name: ATTRACT
description:
If it is the other
gender, the foe is
made infatuated and
unlikely to attack.

name: SLEEP TALK
description:
While asleep, the
user randomly uses
one of the moves it
knows.

name: HEAL BELL
description:
A soothing bell
chimes to heal the
status problems of
all allies.

name: RETURN
description:
This attack move
grows more powerful
the more the user
likes its TRAINER.

name: PRESENT
description:
The foe is given a
booby-trapped gift.
It restores HP
sometimes, however.

name: FRUSTRATION
description:
This attack move
grows more powerful
the less the user
likes its TRAINER.

name: SAFEGUARD
description:
It protects the
user’s party from
all status problems
for five turns.

name: PAIN SPLIT
description:
The user adds its
HP to the foe’s HP,
then equally shares
the total HP.

name: SACRED FIRE
description:
A mystical and
powerful fire
attack that may
inflict a burn.

name: MAGNITUDE
description:
A ground-shaking
attack against all
standing POKéMON.
Its power varies.

name: DYNAMICPUNCH
description:
The foe is punched
with the user’s full
power. It confuses
the foe if it hits.

name: MEGAHORN
description:
A brutal ramming
attack delivered
with a tough and
impressive horn.

name: DRAGONBREATH
description:
The foe is hit with
an incredible blast
of breath that may
also paralyze.

name: BATON PASS
description:
The user switches
out, passing along
any stat changes
to the new battler.

name: ENCORE
description:
Makes the foe use
the move it last
used repeatedly for
two to six turns.

name: PURSUIT
description:
An attack move that
works especially
well on a foe that
is switching out.

name: RAPID SPIN
description:
An attack that
frees the user from
BIND, WRAP, LEECH
SEED, and SPIKES.

name: SWEET SCENT
description:
Allures the foe to
reduce evasiveness.
It also attracts
wild POKéMON.

name: IRON TAIL
description:
An attack with a
steel-hard tail.
It may lower the
foe’s DEFENSE stat.

name: METAL CLAW
description:
The foe is attacked
with steel claws.
It may also raise
the user’s ATTACK.

name: VITAL THROW
description:
Makes the user
attack after the
foe. In return,
it will not miss.

name: MORNING SUN
description:
Restores the user’s
HP. The amount of
HP regained varies
with the weather.

name: SYNTHESIS
description:
Restores the user’s
HP. The amount of
HP regained varies
with the weather.

name: MOONLIGHT
description:
Restores the user’s
HP. The amount of
HP regained varies
with the weather.

name: HIDDEN POWER
description:
An attack that
varies in type and
intensity depending
on the user.

name: CROSS CHOP
description:
The foe is hit with
double chops.
It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: TWISTER
description:
A vicious twister
attacks the foe.
It may make the
foe flinch.

name: RAIN DANCE
description:
A heavy rain falls
for five turns,
powering up WATER-
type moves.

name: SUNNY DAY
description:
The sun blazes for
five turns, powering
up FIRE-type
moves.

name: CRUNCH
description:
The foe is crunched
with sharp fangs.
It may lower the
foe’s SP. DEF.

name: MIRROR COAT
description:
A retaliation move
that pays back the
foe’s special attack
double.

name: PSYCH UP
description:
The user hypnotizes
itself into copying
any stat change
made by the foe.

name: EXTREMESPEED
description:
A blindingly speedy
charge attack that
always goes before
any other.

name: ANCIENTPOWER
description:
An ancient power is
used to attack. It
may also raise all
the user’s stats.

name: SHADOW BALL
description:
A shadowy blob is
hurled at the foe.
May also lower the
foe’s SP. DEF.

name: FUTURE SIGHT
description:
Two turns after
this move is used,
the foe is attacked
psychically.

name: ROCK SMASH
description:
An attack that may
also cut DEFENSE.
It can also smash
cracked boulders.

name: WHIRLPOOL
description:
The foe is trapped
in a fast, vicious
whirlpool for two
to five turns.

name: BEAT UP
description:
All party POKéMON
join in the attack.
The more allies,
the more damage.

name: FAKE OUT
description:
An attack that hits
first and causes
flinching. Usable
only on 1st turn.

name: UPROAR
description:
The user attacks in
an uproar that
prevents sleep for
two to five turns.

name: STOCKPILE
description:
The user charges
up power for use
later. It can be
used three times.

name: SPIT UP
description:
The power built
using STOCKPILE is
released at once
for attack.

name: SWALLOW
description:
The energy it built
using STOCKPILE is
absorbed to restore
HP.

name: HEAT WAVE
description:
The user exhales a
heated breath to
attack. It may also
inflict a burn.

name: HAIL
description:
A hailstorm lasting
five turns damages
all POKéMON except
the ICE-type.

name: TORMENT
description:
It enrages the foe,
making it incapable
of using the same
move successively.

name: FLATTER
description:
Flattery is used to
confuse the foe,
but its SP. ATK
also rises.

name: WILL-O-WISP
description:
A sinister, bluish
white flame is shot
at the foe to
inflict a burn.

name: MEMENTO
description:
The user faints,
but sharply lowers
the foe’s ATTACK
and SP. ATK.

name: FACADE
description:
An attack that is
boosted if user is
burned, poisoned,
or paralyzed.

name: FOCUS PUNCH
description:
An attack that is
executed last.
The user flinches
if hit beforehand.

name: SMELLINGSALT
description:
Doubly effective on
a paralyzed foe,
but it also cures
the foe’s paralysis.

name: FOLLOW ME
description:
The user draws
attention to itself,
making foes attack
only the user.

name: NATURE POWER
description:
An attack that
changes type
depending on the
user’s location.

name: CHARGE
description:
The user charges
power to boost the
ELECTRIC move it
uses next.

name: TAUNT
description:
The foe is taunted
into a rage that
allows it to use
only attack moves.

name: HELPING HAND
description:
A move that boosts
the power of the
ally’s attack in a
battle.

name: TRICK
description:
A move that tricks
the foe into
trading held items
with the user.

name: ROLE PLAY
description:
The user mimics the
foe completely and
copies the foe’s
ability.

name: WISH
description:
A self-healing move
that restores half
the full HP on the
next turn.

name: ASSIST
description:
The user randomly
picks and uses a
move of an allied
POKéMON.

name: INGRAIN
description:
The user lays roots
that restore HP on
every turn.
It can’t switch out.

name: SUPERPOWER
description:
A powerful attack,
but it also lowers
the user’s ATTACK
and DEFENSE stats.

name: MAGIC COAT
description:
Reflects back the
foe’s LEECH SEED
and any status-
damaging move.

name: RECYCLE
description:
A move that
recycles a used
item for use once
more.

name: REVENGE
description:
An attack move that
gains in intensity if
the target has hurt
the user.

name: BRICK BREAK
description:
An attack that also
breaks any barrier
like LIGHT SCREEN
and REFLECT.

name: YAWN
description:
A huge yawn lulls
the foe into falling
asleep on the next
turn.

name: KNOCK OFF
description:
Knocks down the
foe’s held item to
prevent its use
during the battle.

name: ENDEAVOR
description:
Gains power the
fewer HP the user
has compared with
the foe.

name: ERUPTION
description:
The higher the
user’s HP, the more
powerful this
attack becomes.

name: SKILL SWAP
description:
The user employs
its psychic power
to swap abilities
with the foe.

name: IMPRISON
description:
Prevents foes from
using any move
that is also known
by the user.

name: REFRESH
description:
A self-healing move
that cures the user
of a poisoning,
burn, or paralysis.

name: GRUDGE
description:
If the user faints,
this move deletes
the PP of the move
that finished it.

name: SNATCH
description:
Steals the effects
of the foe’s
healing or status-
changing move.

name: SECRET POWER
description:
An attack that may
have an additional
effect that varies
with the terrain.

name: DIVE
description:
The user dives
underwater on the
first turn and
strikes next turn.

name: ARM THRUST
description:
A quick flurry of
straight-arm
punches that hit
two to five times.

name: CAMOUFLAGE
description:
Alters the user’s
type depending on
the location’s
terrain.

name: TAIL GLOW
description:
The user flashes a
light that sharply
raises its SP. ATK
stat.

name: LUSTER PURGE
description:
A burst of light
injures the foe. It
may also lower the
foe’s SP. DEF.

name: MIST BALL
description:
A flurry of down
hits the foe. It
may also lower the
foe’s SP. ATK.

name: FEATHERDANCE
description:
The foe is covered
with a mass of down
that sharply cuts
the ATTACK stat.

name: TEETER DANCE
description:
A wobbly dance
that confuses all
the POKéMON in
battle.

name: BLAZE KICK
description:
A fiery kick with a
high critical-hit
ratio. It may also
burn the foe.

name: MUD SPORT
description:
Weakens ELECTRIC-
type attacks while
the user is in the
battle.

name: ICE BALL
description:
A 5-turn rolling
attack that becomes
stronger each time
it rolls.

name: NEEDLE ARM
description:
An attack using
thorny arms.
It may make the
foe flinch.

name: SLACK OFF
description:
The user slacks off
and restores its HP
by half its full
HP.

name: HYPER VOICE
description:
The user lets loose
a horribly loud
shout with the
power to damage.

name: POISON FANG
description:
The foe is bitten
with toxic fangs.
It may also badly
poison the foe.

name: CRUSH CLAW
description:
The foe is attacked
with sharp claws.
It may also lower
the foe’s DEFENSE.

name: BLAST BURN
description:
The foe is hit with
a huge explosion.
The user can’t move
on the next turn.

name: HYDRO CANNON
description:
The foe is hit with
a watery cannon.
The user can’t move
on the next turn.

name: METEOR MASH
description:
The foe is hit with
a hard, fast punch.
It may also raise
the user’s ATTACK.

name: ASTONISH
description:
An attack using a
startling shout.
It also may make
the foe flinch.

name: WEATHER BALL
description:
An attack that
varies in power and
type depending on
the weather.

name: AROMATHERAPY
description:
A soothing scent is
released to heal
all status problems
in the user’s party.

name: FAKE TEARS
description:
The user feigns
crying to sharply
lower the foe’s
SP. DEF stat.

name: AIR CUTTER
description:
The foe is hit with
razor-like wind.
It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: OVERHEAT
description:
An intense attack
that also sharply
reduces the user’s
SP. ATK stat.

name: ODOR SLEUTH
description:
Completely negates
the foe’s efforts to
heighten its ability
to evade.

name: ROCK TOMB
description:
Boulders are hurled
at the foe. It also
lowers the foe’s
SPEED if it hits.

name: SILVER WIND
description:
The foe is attacked
with a silver dust.
It may raise all
the user’s stats.

name: METAL SOUND
description:
A horrible metallic
screech is used to
sharply lower the
foe’s SP. DEF.

name: GRASSWHISTLE
description:
A pleasant melody
is played to lull
the foe into a deep
sleep.

name: TICKLE
description:
The foe is made to
laugh, reducing its
ATTACK and DEFENSE
stats.

name: COSMIC POWER
description:
The user absorbs a
mystic power to
raise its DEFENSE
and SP. DEF.

name: WATER SPOUT
description:
The higher the
user’s HP, the more
powerful this
attack becomes.

name: SIGNAL BEAM
description:
The foe is hit with
a flashing beam
that may also
cause confusion.

name: SHADOW PUNCH
description:
The user throws a
punch from the
shadows. It cannot
be evaded.

name: EXTRASENSORY
description:
The user attacks
with an odd power
that may make the
foe flinch.

name: SKY UPPERCUT
description:
The user attacks
with an uppercut
thrown skywards
with force.

name: SAND TOMB
description:
The foe is trapped
inside a painful
sandstorm for two
to five turns.

name: SHEER COLD
description:
The foe is attacked
with ultimate cold
that causes fainting
if it hits.

name: MUDDY WATER
description:
The user attacks
with muddy water.
It may also lower
the foe’s accuracy.

name: BULLET SEED
description:
The user shoots
seeds at the foe.
Two to five seeds
are shot at once.

name: AERIAL ACE
description:
An extremely fast
attack against one
target. It can’t be
evaded.

name: ICICLE SPEAR
description:
Sharp icicles are
fired at the foe.
It strikes two to
five times.

name: IRON DEFENSE
description:
The user hardens
its body’s surface
to sharply raise its
DEFENSE stat.

name: BLOCK
description:
The user blocks the
foe’s way with arms
spread wide to
prevent escape.

name: HOWL
description:
The user howls to
raise its spirit and
boost its ATTACK
stat.

name: DRAGON CLAW
description:
Sharp, huge claws
hook and slash the
foe quickly and
with great power.

name: FRENZY PLANT
description:
The foe is hit with
an enormous branch.
The user can’t move
on the next turn.

name: BULK UP
description:
The user bulks up
its body to boost
both its ATTACK and
DEFENSE stats.

name: BOUNCE
description:
The user bounces
on the foe on the
2nd turn. It may
paralyze the foe.

name: MUD SHOT
description:
The user attacks by
hurling mud.
It also reduces the
foe’s SPEED.

name: POISON TAIL
description:
An attack with a
high critical-hit
ratio. It may also
poison the foe.

name: COVET
description:
A cutely executed
attack that also
steals the foe’s
hold item.

name: VOLT TACKLE
description:
The user throws an
electrified tackle.
It hurts the user
a little.

name: MAGICAL LEAF
description:
The foe is attacked
with a strange leaf
that cannot be
evaded.

name: WATER SPORT
description:
Weakens FIRE-type
attacks while the
user is in the
battle.

name: CALM MIND
description:
The user focuses
its mind to raise
the SP. ATK and
SP. DEF stats.

name: LEAF BLADE
description:
The foe is slashed
with a sharp leaf.
It has a high
critical-hit ratio.

name: DRAGON DANCE
description:
A mystic, powerful
dance that boosts
the user’s ATTACK
and SPEED stats.

name: ROCK BLAST
description:
The user hurls two
to five hard rocks
at the foe to
attack.

name: SHOCK WAVE
description:
A rapid jolt of
electricity strikes
the foe. It can’t
be evaded.

name: WATER PULSE
description:
An attack with a
pulsing blast of
water. It may also
confuse the foe.

name: DOOM DESIRE
description:
A move that attacks
the foe with a
blast of light two
turns after use.

name: PSYCHO BOOST
description:
An intense attack
that also sharply
reduces the user’s
SP. ATK stat.

name: ECRAS’FACE
description: Ecrase l’ennemi\navec les pattes\navant ou la queue.

name: POING-KARATE
description: Une attaque\ntranchante à taux\nde critiques élevé.

name: TORGNOLES
description: Gifle rapidement\nl’ennemi\nde 2 à 5 fois.

name: POING COMETE
description: Frappe rapidement\nl’ennemi\nde 2 à 5 fois.

name: ULTIMAPOING
description: Un coup de poing\nd’une puissance\nincroyable.

name: JACKPOT
description: Lance des pièces.\nL’argent est\nrécupéré plus tard.

name: POING DE FEU
description: Un poing de feu\npouvant brûler\nl’ennemi.

name: POINGLACE
description: Un poing de glace\npouvant\ngeler l’ennemi.

name: POING-ECLAIR
description: Un poing électrique\npouvant paralyser\nl’ennemi.

name: GRIFFE
description: Lacère l’ennemi\navec des griffes\nacérées.

name: FORCE POIGNE
description: Empoigne l’ennemi\navec de puissantes\npinces.

name: GUILLOTINE
description: Un puissant coup\nde pince qui peut\nmettre KO.

name: COUPE-VENT
description:
Une attaque en
2 tours qui
frappe au
2ᵉ tour.

name: DANSE-LAMES
description: Une danse de\ncombat pour\nbooster l’ATTAQUE.

name: COUPE
description:
Une attaque
basique. Peut 
couper des
petits arbres.

name: TORNADE
description: Envoie une rafale\nde vent en battant\ndes ailes.

name: CRU-AILE
description: Frappe l’ennemi\nen déployant les\nailes.

name: CYCLONE
description: Envoie une rafale\nde vent et met fin\nau combat.

name: VOL
description: S’envole au premier\ntour et frappe au\nsecond.

name: ETREINTE
description: Ligote l’ennemi et\nl’écrase pendant\n2 à 5 tours.

name: SOUPLESSE
description: Fouette l’ennemi\navec la queue, une\nliane, etc.

name: FOUET LIANES
description: Fouette l’ennemi\navec de fines\nlianes.

name: ECRASEMENT
description: Ecrase avec un\nénorme pied. Peut\napeurer l’ennemi.

name: DOUBLE PIED
description: Un double coup de\npied qui frappe\nl’ennemi deux fois.

name: ULTIMAWASHI
description: Un coup de pied\nsuper puissant\net intense.

name: PIED SAUTE
description: Un coup de pied\nsauté. Peut blesser\nle lanceur si raté.

name: MAWASHI GERI
description: Un coup de pied\ntournoyant et\nextrêmement rapide.

name: JET DE SABLE
description: Lance du sable et\nbaisse la précision\nde l’ennemi.

name: COUP D’BOULE
description: Une charge qui\npeut apeurer\nl’ennemi.

name: KOUD’KORNE
description: Frappe l’ennemi\nd’un coup\nde corne pointue.

name: FURIE
description:
Frappe l’ennemi
2 à 5 fois avec
une corne, un bec,
etc.

name: EMPAL’KORNE
description: Empale l’ennemi\nd’un coup de corne.\nMet KO en un coup.

name: CHARGE
description: Charge l’ennemi\navec un\nviolent plaquage.

name: PLAQUAGE
description: Une attaque en\ncharge. Peut\nparalyser l’ennemi.

name: LIGOTAGE
description:
Ligote l’ennemi et
l’étouffe pendant
2 à 5 tours avec
des lianes.

name: BELIER
description:
Une charge violente
qui blesse aussi
légèrement le
lanceur.

name: MANIA
description:
Une attaque
furieuse de 2 à 3
tours. Le lanceur
devient confus.

name: DAMOCLES
description:
Une dangereuse
charge qui blesse
aussi légèrement
le lanceur.

name: MIMI-QUEUE
description:
Remue la queue
pour baisser la
DEFENSE de
l’ennemi.

name: DARD-VENIN
description:
Une attaque de
dards, etc.,
pouvant
empoisonner.

name: DOUBLE-DARD
description:
Les dards des
pattes avant
frappent
deux fois.

name: DARD-NUEE
description: Envoie des dards\nqui frappent\n2 à 5 fois.

name: GROZ’YEUX
description: Lance un regard\nnoir et baisse\nla DEFENSE.

name: MORSURE
description: Mord méchamment\nl’ennemi et peut\nl’apeurer.

name: RUGISSEMENT
description:
Rugit gentiment
et baisse
l’ATTAQUE de
l’ennemi.

name: HURLEMENT
description: Fait fuir l’ennemi\npour mettre fin au\ncombat.

name: BERCEUSE
description: Berceuse plongeant\nl’ennemi dans un\nprofond sommeil.

name: ULTRASON
description: Etranges ondes\nsonores pouvant\nrendre confus.

name: SONICBOOM
description: Envoie des ondes\nde choc infligeant\n20 PV de dégâts.

name: ENTRAVE
description:
Empêche
l’utilisation d’une
des attaques
de l’ennemi.

name: ACIDE
description: Pulvérise un acide.\nPeut baisser la\nDEFENSE ennemie.

name: FLAMMECHE
description: Une faible attaque\nde feu pouvant\nbrûler l’ennemi.

name: LANCE-FLAMME
description:
Une puissante
attaque de feu
pouvant brûler
l’ennemi.

name: BRUME
description:
Crée une brume
stoppant la
réduction
des capacités.

name: PISTOLET A O
description: Attaque l’ennemi\nen projetant de\nl’eau.

name: HYDROCANON
description:
Envoie un
puissant jet
d’eau pour
frapper l’ennemi.

name: SURF
description:
Crée une énorme
vague qui
s’écrase sur
l’ennemi.

name: LASER GLACE
description:
Envoie un rayon
de glace
pouvant geler
l’ennemi.

name: BLIZZARD
description:
Déclenche une
tempête de neige
pouvant geler
l’ennemi.

name: RAFALE PSY
description: Etrange rayon\npouvant rendre\nl’ennemi confus.

name: BULLES D’O
description: Envoie des bulles\npouvant baisser\nla VITESSE.

name: ONDE BOREALE
description:
Envoie un rayon
arc-en-ciel
pouvant baisser
l’ATTAQUE.

name: ULTRALASER
description:
Puissant, mais 
immobilise
le lanceur pour
un tour.

name: PICPIC
description: Attaque l’ennemi\navec une corne,\nun bec pointu, etc.

name: BEC VRILLE
description:
Une attaque
utilisant le
bec comme
une perceuse.

name: SACRIFICE
description:
Une charge
violente qui
blesse aussi
le lanceur.

name: BALAYAGE
description:
Un coup de pied
faisant plus de
dégâts aux ennemis
lourds.

name: RIPOSTE
description: Renvoie toute\nattaque physique,\n2 fois plus fort.

name: FRAPPE ATLAS
description: Inflige des dégâts\nselon le niveau\ndu lanceur.

name: FORCE
description:
Accumule de la
puissance,
puis frappe
l’ennemi.

name: VOL-VIE
description:
Une attaque
qui convertit les
dégâts infligés
en PV.

name: MEGA-SANGSUE
description:
Une attaque qui
convertit la moitié
des dégâts infligés
en PV.

name: VAMPIGRAINE
description: Plante des graines\npour voler des PV\nà chaque tour.

name: CROISSANCE
description: Développe le\ncorps et augmente\nl’ATQ. SPE.

name: TRANCH’HERBE
description:
Tranche avec
des feuilles.
Taux de critiques
élevé.

name: LANCE-SOLEIL
description: Absorbe la lumière\net attaque le tour\nsuivant.

name: POUDRE TOXIK
description: Répand une poudre\ntoxique pouvant\nempoisonner.

name: PARA-SPORE
description: Répand une poudre\npouvant paralyser\nl’ennemi.

name: POUDRE DODO
description: Répand une poudre\npouvant endormir\nl’ennemi.

name: DANSE-FLEUR
description:
Une attaque
furieuse de 2 à 3
tours. Le lanceur
devient confus.

name: SECRETION
description: Ligote l’ennemi\nafin de réduire\nsa VITESSE.

name: DRACO-RAGE
description: Envoie des ondes\nde choc infligeant\n40 PV de dégâts.

name: DANSEFLAMME
description:
Encercle l’ennemi
avec des flammes
pendant 2 à 5
tours.

name: ECLAIR
description: Une attaque\nélectrique pouvant\nparalyser l’ennemi.

name: TONNERRE
description: Une forte attaque\nélectrique pouvant\nparalyser l’ennemi.

name: CAGE-ECLAIR
description: Un faible choc\nélectrique qui\nparalyse l’ennemi.

name: FATAL-FOUDRE
description: Une attaque\nfoudroyante pouvant\nparalyser l’ennemi.

name: JET-PIERRES
description: Envoie des cailloux\npour frapper\nl’ennemi.

name: SEISME
description:
Tremblement de
terre sans effet
sur les adversaires
volants.

name: ABIME
description:
Fait tomber
l’ennemi dans une
crevasse et le
met KO.

name: TUNNEL
description: Creuse sous terre\nau 1ᵉʳ tour\net frappe au 2ᵉ.

name: TOXIK
description:
Empoisonne
l’ennemi avec
une toxine de plus
en plus forte.

name: CHOC MENTAL
description: Une attaque PSY\npouvant rendre\nl’ennemi confus.

name: PSYKO
description:
Une puissante
attaque PSY
pouvant baisser
la DEF. SPE.

name: HYPNOSE
description:
Une attaque
hypnotique
pouvant endormir
l’ennemi.

name: YOGA
description:
Méditation
pacifique pour
augmenter
l’ATTAQUE.

name: HATE
description:
Relaxation du
corps pour
booster la
VITESSE.

name: VIVE-ATTAQUE
description: Attaque fulgurante\nqui permet de\nfrapper en premier.

name: FRENESIE
description:
Augmente
l’ATTAQUE du
lanceur à chaque
coup reçu.

name: TELEPORT
description:
Attaque PSY
permettant de
prendre aussitôt
la fuite.

name: TENEBRES
description:
Un mirage qui
inflige des dégâts
selon le niveau
du lanceur.

name: COPIE
description:
Imite la
dernière attaque
utilisée par
l’ennemi.

name: GRINCEMENT
description:
Cri strident qui
baisse beaucoup
la DEFENSE
ennemie.

name: REFLET
description:
Crée des
images-miroirs
pour augmenter
l’esquive.

name: SOIN
description: Restaure jusqu’à\nla moitié des PV\nmax du lanceur.

name: ARMURE
description:
Contracte les
muscles pour
augmenter la
DEFENSE.

name: LILLIPUT
description:
Rapetisse le
lanceur pour
augmenter
l’esquive.

name: BROUILLARD
description:
Baisse la précision
ennemie en
utilisant fumée,
encre, etc.

name: ONDE FOLIE
description: Un horrible rayon\nqui rend\nl’ennemi confus.

name: REPLI
description:
Se recroqueville
dans sa carapace
et augmente la
DEFENSE.

name: BOUL’ARMURE
description:
S’enroule pour
cacher ses points
faibles et monter
sa DEFENSE.

name: BOUCLIER
description: Crée une barrière\npour booster la\nDEFENSE.

name: MUR LUMIERE
description:
Crée un mur
lumineux et
réduit les dégâts
d’ATQ. SPE.

name: BUEE NOIRE
description: Crée un nuage noir\nannulant tout\nchangement d’état.

name: PROTECTION
description:
Crée un mur
lumineux qui
affaiblit les att.
physiques 5 tours.

name: PUISSANCE
description:
Concentration
pour booster
le taux de
critiques.

name: PATIENCE
description:
Encaisse les
attaques sur 2
tours et renvoie
le double.

name: METRONOME
description:
Remue un doigt
et lance une
attaque POKéMON
au hasard.

name: MIMIQUE
description: Contre l’attaque de\nl’ennemi avec la\nmême attaque.

name: DESTRUCTION
description: Inflige de sérieux\ndégâts, mais met le\nlanceur KO.

name: BOMB’OEUF
description: Envoie violemment\nun œuf en direction\nde l’ennemi.

name: LECHOUILLE
description: Blesse avec un long\ncoup de langue.\nPeut paralyser.

name: PUREDPOIS
description: Un gaz nocif\npouvant empoisonner\nl’ennemi.

name: DETRITUS
description:
Blesse en envoyant
des détritus
toxiques. Peut
empoisonner.

name: MASSD’OS
description: Cogne l’ennemi\navec un os. Peut\napeurer.

name: DEFLAGRATION
description:
Une explosion
de flammes.
Peut brûler
l’ennemi.

name: CASCADE
description:
Charge puissante
permettant de
franchir des
cascades.

name: CLAQUOIR
description: Piège l’ennemi et\nl’écrase pendant\n2 à 5 tours.

name: METEORES
description:
Envoie des rayons
en forme d’étoile.
Touche toujours
la cible.

name: COUD’KRANE
description: Monte la DEFENSE\nau 1ᵉʳ tour\net frappe au 2ᵉ.

name: PICANON
description: Lance des pointes\nqui frappent\n2 à 5 fois.

name: CONSTRICTION
description:
Etrangle avec des
tentacules ou des
lianes. Peut baisser
la VITESSE.

name: AMNESIE
description:
Oublie quelque
chose et
booste la
DEF. SPE.

name: TELEKINESIE
description:
Distrait l’ennemi
avec une cuillère.
Peut baisser la
précision.

name: E-COQUE
description:
Restaure jusqu’à
la moitié des PV
max. Utilisable sur
un allié.

name: PIED VOLTIGE
description:
Coup de pied
sauté. S’il est
raté, le lanceur
se blesse.

name: INTIMIDATION
description: Intimide l’ennemi\net le paralyse de\nterreur.

name: DEVOREVE
description:
Convertit en PV la
moitié des dégâts
infligés à l’ennemi
endormi.

name: GAZ TOXIK
description: Enveloppe l’ennemi\nd’un gaz toxique.\nPeut empoisonner.

name: PILONNAGE
description: Projette 2 à 5 fois\ndes objets ronds\nvers l’ennemi.

name: VAMPIRISME
description:
Une attaque qui
convertit en PV
la moitié des
dégâts infligés.

name: GROBISOU
description: Demande un bisou\nen grimaçant.\nPeut endormir.

name: PIQUE
description:
Attaque en 2 tours.
Taux de critiques
élevé. Peut
apeurer l’ennemi.

name: MORPHING
description: Modifie ses\ncellules pour\ncopier l’ennemi.

name: ECUME
description: Une attaque de\nbulles pouvant\nbaisser la VITESSE.

name: UPPERCUT
description: Un coup de poing\ncadencé. Peut\nrendre confus.

name: SPORE
description: Répand un nuage\nde spores qui\nendort.

name: FLASH
description: Explosion lumineuse\nqui fait baisser\nla précision.

name: VAGUE PSY
description: Envoie une onde\nPSY d’intensité\nvariable.

name: TREMPETTE
description: Eclabousse l’ennemi\nsans aucun effet.

name: ACIDARMURE
description: Liquéfie le corps\ndu lanceur et\nbooste sa DEFENSE.

name: PINCE-MASSE
description: Attaque critique\nqui utilise une\ngrosse pince.

name: EXPLOSION
description: Inflige de sérieux\ndégâts, mais met le\nlanceur KO.

name: COMBO-GRIFFE
description:
Ecorche l’ennemi
avec des griffes
ou des faux
de 2 à 5 fois.

name: OSMERANG
description: Lance un boomerang\nen os qui frappe\ndeux fois.

name: REPOS
description:
Le lanceur dort
2 tours et regagne
ses PV et son
statut normal.

name: EBOULEMENT
description: Envoie de gros\nrochers. Peut\napeurer l’ennemi.

name: CROC DE MORT
description: Blesse d’un coup\nde croc. Peut\napeurer l’ennemi.

name: AFFUTAGE
description:
Réduit le nombre
de polygones
et augmente
l’ATTAQUE.

name: ADAPTATION
description:
Change le type
du lanceur en
celui d’une
capacité.

name: TRIPLATTAQUE
description: Envoie trois types\nde rayons en\nmême temps.

name: CROC FATAL
description: Coup de croc qui\nfait baisser les\nPV de moitié.

name: TRANCHE
description: Coups de griffe,\netc. Taux de\ncritiques élevé.

name: CLONAGE
description: Crée un leurre\navec 1/4 des PV\nmax du lanceur.

name: LUTTE
description:
Fonctionne s’il ne
reste plus de PP.
Blesse légèrement
le lanceur.

name: GRIBOUILLE
description:
Copie en
permanence la
dernière attaque
ennemie.

name: TRIPLE PIED
description: Trois coups de pied\nde plus en plus\npuissants.

name: LARCIN
description: Peut voler l’objet\ntenu par l’ennemi\npendant l’attaque.

name: TOILE
description:
Capture l’ennemi
et empêche
toute fuite ou
changement.

name: LIRE-ESPRIT
description: Pressent l’action\npour réussir\nl’attaque suivante.

name: CAUCHEMAR
description:
Un cauchemar qui
inflige des dégâts
à chaque tour à
l’ennemi endormi.

name: ROUE DE FEU
description:
Une charge
enflammée qui
peut brûler
l’ennemi.

name: RONFLEMENT
description: Attaque sonore qui\nne peut être lancée\nqu’endormi.

name: MALEDICTION
description: Coup qui fonctionne\nautrement pour les\nSPECTRES.

name: FLEAU
description:
Inflige plus de
dégâts quand le
lanceur n’a presque
plus de PV.

name: CONVERSION 2
description: Permet de résister\nau type de la\ndernière attaque.

name: AEROBLAST
description: Implosion à taux de\ncritiques élevé.

name: SPORE COTON
description:
Envoie des spores
pour baisser
beaucoup la
VITESSE.

name: CONTRE
description:
Inflige plus de
dégâts quand les
PV du lanceur
sont faibles.

name: DEPIT
description:
Réduit de 2 à 5 
les PP de la
dernière attaque
ennemie.

name: POUDREUSE
description: Envoie une rafale\nde neige. Peut\ngeler l’ennemi.

name: ABRI
description: Esquive l’attaque,\nmais peut échouer\nsi réutilisé.

name: MACH PUNCH
description: Coup de poing\nfulgurant. Permet\nde frapper en 1ᵉʳ.

name: GRIMACE
description:
Effraye avec une
grimace pour
baisser beaucoup
la VITESSE.

name: FEINTE
description: Attire l’ennemi et\nfrappe sans jamais\néchouer.

name: DOUX BAISER
description: Demande un bisou\ntout mignon. Peut\nrendre confus.

name: COGNOBIDON
description: Améliore l’ATTAQUE\nà fond en sacrifiant\nla moitié des PV.

name: BOMB-BEURK
description: Envoie des détritus\npour blesser.\nPeut empoisonner.

name: COUD’BOUE
description:
Envoie de la boue
au visage pour
baisser la
précision.

name: OCTAZOOKA
description:
Jette de l’encre au
visage de l’ennemi
pour baisser sa
précision.

name: PICOTS
description:
Pointes pour
piéger les ennemis
qui échangent leur
place.

name: ELECANON
description: Puissant et\nparalysant, mais\npas très précis.

name: CLAIRVOYANCE
description: Empêche l’ennemi\nd’améliorer son\nesquive.

name: PRLVT DESTIN
description: Si le lanceur est\nmis KO, l’ennemi\nle sera également.

name: REQUIEM
description: Un POKéMON qui\nentend ce requiem\nest KO en 3 tours.

name: VENT GLACE
description: Attaque glaciale.\nBaisse la VITESSE\nde l’ennemi.

name: DETECTION
description: Esquive l’attaque,\nmais peut échouer\nsi réutilisé.

name: CHARGE-OS
description: Frappe l’ennemi\n2 à 5 fois\navec un os.

name: VERROUILLAGE
description:
Verrouille la cible
pour ne pas la
rater au tour
suivant.

name: COLERE
description:
Une attaque
furieuse sur
2 à 3 tours.
Lanceur confus.

name: TEMPETESABLE
description: Une tempête de\nsable qui souffle\npendant 5 tours.

name: GIGA-SANGSUE
description:
Absorbe la moitié
des dégâts infligés
et les convertit en
PV.

name: TENACITE
description:
Résiste aux
attaques du tour
avec 1 PV. Peut
échouer si répété.

name: CHARME
description:
Charme l’ennemi
et baisse
beaucoup son
ATTAQUE.

name: ROULADE
description: Une attaque sur\n5 tours, de plus en\nplus puissante.

name: FAUX-CHAGE
description:
Une attaque qui
laisse au
moins 1 PV à
l’ennemi.

name: VANTARDISE
description: Rend l’ennemi\nconfus et\nbooste l’ATTAQUE.

name: LAIT A BOIRE
description:
Regagne jusqu’à
la moitié des PV
max du lanceur
ou d’un allié.

name: ETINCELLE
description: Une charge\nélectrique qui peut\nparalyser l’ennemi.

name: TAILLADE
description: Une attaque qui\ns’intensifie après\nchaque coup.

name: AILE D’ACIER
description:
Frappe l’ennemi en 
déployant ses ailes
d’acier. Peut
monter la DEFENSE.

name: REGARD NOIR
description: Lance un regard\nméchant pour\nempêcher la fuite.

name: ATTRACTION
description: Le genre opposé\na moins de\nchances d’attaquer.

name: BLABLA DODO
description: Utilise un coup\nau hasard\nen dormant.

name: GLAS DE SOIN
description:
Carillon apaisant
qui soigne les 
changements de
statut des alliés.

name: RETOUR
description:
Attaque dont la
puissance dépend
de l’amitié avec le
DRESSEUR.

name: CADEAU
description: Cadeau en forme\nde bombe. Peut\nrestaurer des PV.

name: FRUSTRATION
description:
Attaque plus
puissante si le
DRESSEUR est
mal aimé.

name: RUNE PROTECT
description:
Force mystique
empêchant tout
changement de
statut.

name: BALANCE
description: Ajoute les PV des\ndeux combattants\net les partage.

name: FEU SACRE
description:
Une attaque de feu
puissante et
mystique
pouvant brûler.

name: AMPLEUR
description: Un tremblement\nde terre d’intensité\nvariable.

name: DYNAMOPOING
description: Puissant et rend\nconfus, mais pas\ntrès précis.

name: MEGACORNE
description: Une charge\nviolente, toutes\ncornes en avant.

name: DRACOSOUFFLE
description:
Frappe l’ennemi
grâce à un souffle
super puissant
pouvant paralyser.

name: RELAIS
description:
Change de lanceur,
mais transmet les
changements de
stats.

name: ENCORE
description: Oblige l’ennemi à\nrépéter sa dernière\naction 2 à 6 tours.

name: POURSUITE
description: Inflige de sérieux\ndégâts lorsque\nl’ennemi change.

name: TOUR RAPIDE
description: Frappe l’ennemi\nen tournant sur\nsoi-même.

name: DOUX PARFUM
description:
Séduit l’ennemi
pour baisser son
esquive. Attire les
POKéMON sauvages.

name: QUEUE DE FER
description: Attaque avec la\nqueue. Peut baisser\nla DEFENSE.

name: GRIFFE ACIER
description:
Attaque avec des
griffes. Peut
augmenter
l’ATTAQUE.

name: CORPS PERDU
description: Attaque après\nl’ennemi, mais\nn’échoue jamais.

name: AURORE
description: Restaure les PV.\nLa quantité varie\nsuivant le temps.

name: SYNTHESE
description: Restaure les PV.\nLa quantité varie\nsuivant le temps.

name: RAYON LUNE
description: Restaure les PV.\nLa quantité varie\nsuivant le temps.

name: PUIS. CACHEE
description:
L’efficacité et le
type de l’attaque
dépendent du
lanceur.

name: COUP-CROIX
description: 2 attaques\ntranchantes. Taux\nde critiques élevé.

name: OURAGAN
description:
Déclenche un
terrible ouragan
blessant l’ennemi.
Peut apeurer.

name: DANSE PLUIE
description: Améliore les\nattaques EAU\npendant 5 tours.

name: ZENITH
description: Améliore les\nattaques FEU\npendant 5 tours.

name: MACHOUILLE
description:
Utilise ses crocs
pointus. Peut
baisser la
DEF. SPE.

name: VOILE MIROIR
description: Renvoie l’attaque\nspéciale ennemie\n2 fois plus fort.

name: BOOST
description: Copie les effets\nde l’ennemi et les\npasse au lanceur.

name: VIT.EXTREME
description:
Une attaque
extrêmement
rapide et
puissante.

name: POUV.ANTIQUE
description: Une attaque\npouvant augmenter\ntoutes les stats.

name: BALL’OMBRE
description:
Projette une
grande tache
qui peut baisser
la DEF. SPE.

name: PRESCIENCE
description:
Accumule de
l’énergie pour
frapper 2 tours
plus tard.

name: ECLATE-ROC
description:
Une attaque qui
peut baisser la
DEFENSE et briser
des rochers.

name: SIPHON
description:
Piège l’ennemi
dans un tourbillon
pendant
2 à 5 tours.

name: BASTON
description:
Appelle les
POKéMON de l’équipe
à se joindre à
l’attaque.

name: BLUFF
description: Une attaque en\ndébut de bataille\npour apeurer.

name: BROUHAHA
description:
Brouhaha de
2 à 5 tours.
Empêche de
dormir.

name: STOCKAGE
description: Accumule de la\npuissance pendant\n3 tours maximum.

name: RELACHE
description:
Libère la puissance
précédemment
accumulée avec
STOCKAGE.

name: AVALE
description:
Absorbe la
puissance accumulée
avec STOCKAGE
et restaure les PV.

name: CANICULE
description: Un souffle ardent\npouvant brûler\nl’ennemi.

name: GRELE
description: Tempête de grêle\nqui dure\npendant 5 tours.

name: TOURMENTE
description:
Perturbe l’ennemi.
Empêche la
réutilisation d’une
attaque.

name: FLATTERIE
description:
Rend l’ennemi
confus, mais
augmente son 
ATQ. SPE.

name: FEU FOLLET
description: Inflige une\ndouloureuse \nbrûlure à l’ennemi.

name: SOUVENIR
description:
Le lanceur est mis
KO mais baisse
beaucoup l’ATTAQUE
et l’ATQ. SPE.

name: FACADE
description:
Booste l’ATTAQUE
si le lanceur est
brûlé, paralysé
ou empoisonné.

name: MITRA-POING
description: Attaque en dernier.\nLanceur apeuré\nsi touché avant.

name: STIMULANT
description:
Doublement efficace
contre les ennemis
paralysés, mais
les soigne.

name: PAR ICI
description:
Attire l’attention.
Les adversaires.
n’attaquent que le
lanceur.

name: FORCE-NATURE
description:
Le type de
l’attaque change
selon le lieu
du combat.

name: CHARGEUR
description:
Charge de la
puissance pour son
attaque ELECTRIK
suivante.

name: PROVOC
description:
Provoque l’ennemi.
L’oblige à utiliser
seulement ses
attaques.

name: COUP D’MAIN
description:
Améliore la
puissance
d’attaque du
receveur.

name: TOURMAGIK
description: Oblige la cible à\néchanger\nles objets tenus.

name: IMITATION
description: Imite la cible et\ncopie sa capacité\nspéciale.

name: VOEU
description:
Un vœu qui
restaure la moitié 
des PV au tour
suivant.

name: ASSISTANCE
description: Attaque au hasard\navec un coup d’un\ndes partenaires.

name: RACINES
description:
Plante des racines
pour gagner des PV
chaque tour. Ne
peut plus changer.

name: SURPUISSANCE
description:
Attaque puissante
mais baisse les
stats d’ATTAQUE
et DEFENSE.

name: REFLET MAGIK
description:
Renvoie au lanceur
VAMPIGRAINE et les
capacités qui
changent le statut.

name: RECYCLAGE
description: Recycle un objet\npour l’utiliser une\nfois de plus.

name: VENDETTA
description: Gagne en puissance\nquand blessé par\nl’ennemi.

name: CASSE-BRIQUE
description:
Attaque qui brise
les barrières comme
PROTECTION et
MUR LUMIERE.

name: BAILLEMENT
description:
Fait bâiller
l’ennemi qui
s’endort au tour
suivant.

name: SABOTAGE
description:
Frappe l’objet
tenu par l’ennemi
pour le rendre
inutilisable.

name: EFFORT
description:
Gagne en
puissance si PV
inférieurs aux
PV ennemis.

name: ERUPTION
description:
Inflige plus de
dégâts si les PV
du lanceur sont
élevés.

name: ECHANGE
description:
Le lanceur et la
cible échangent
leur capacité
spéciale.
